DOC.brief_summary: The study focuses to prove the equivalent efficacy of two different Dexpanthenol formulations.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Dexpanthenol in Thermic Erythema
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects Phototype: I to IV according to Fitzpatrick scale Pregnant or nursing women Subjects registered as being in exclusion period in the French Health Minister file of subjects Subjects with known allergy to cosmetics, skin care products, or topical drugs, a sensitivity related to any component of any formulations being tested
